text.autoconfig.indicatia.title: Indicatia Config
text.autoconfig.indicatia.option.enableA: This option allows to use Numpad Enter key to open the chat.
text.autoconfig.indicatia.option.display: Enable Potion Duration on the Top Right of Potion HUD
Display potion duration time on the top right of Potion HUD.
text.autoconfig.indicatia.option.confirm: Show confirmation screen before disconnect from the server.
text.autoconfig.indicatia.option.enableE: Enable enchanting effect rendering on skulls.
text.autoconfig.indicatia.option.enableR: Enable reload resources button on a pack selection screen.
text.autoconfig.indicatia.option.saveLas: Save Last Search in the Recipe Book
This option saves your last search in the recipe book.
